mapper.select: SELECT roomno, roomtype, title, floor, area, fee, confirmdate, address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, userno FROM room WHERE roomno=#{roomno};

SELECT r.roomno, r.roomtype, p.dealingtype, p.price, title, floor, area, fee, confirmdate, address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, r.userno, u.name , r.status, cnt FROM room r INNER JOIN user u ON r.userno=u.userno INNER JOIN price p ON r.roomno=p.roomno LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT roomno, count(roomno) AS cnt from fakeroom group by roomno)f ON r.roomno=f.roomno
roomtype LIKE concat('%', #{roomtype}, '%')
OR dealingtype LIKE concat('%', #{dealingtype}, '%')
OR name LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%')
GROUP BY r.roomno ORDER BY r.roomno ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{listCount}

SELECT r.userno, r.status, r.roomno, r.roomtype, r.confirmdate, r.address, p.dealingtype, p.deposit, p.price FROM room r INNER JOIN price p ON r.roomno=p.roomno INNER JOIN user u ON r.userno=#{userno} WHERE status IN (0,1) GROUP BY r.roomno ORDER BY r.roomno

SELECT r.userno, r.status, r.roomno, r.roomtype, r.confirmdate, r.address, p.dealingtype, p.deposit, p.price FROM room r INNER JOIN price p ON r.roomno=p.roomno INNER JOIN user u ON r.userno=#{userno} WHERE status IN (2,3,4) GROUP BY r.roomno ORDER BY r.roomno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (roomtype, title, floor, area, fee, confirmdate, address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, region_2depth_name, region_3depth_name, userno) VALUES (#{roomtype}, #{title}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{fee}, #{confirmdate}, #{address}, #{dong}, #{ho}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{region_2depth_name}, #{region_3depth_name}, #{userno});
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET status=#{status} WHERE roomno=#{roomno};
UPDATE room SET confirmdate=now(), status="1" WHERE roomno=#{roomno};
UPDATE room SET status="3" WHERE roomno=#{roomno};
UPDATE room SET status="2" WHERE roomno=#{roomno};
